Item ID1619

An uncut ruby is a red gem used in Crafting and Fletching. With level 34 Crafting, a player can use a chisel on it to make it into a ruby, granting 85 Crafting experience.

Contents

  • 1 Obtaining
  • 2 Products
  • 3 Item sources
    • 3.1 Shop locations
  • 4 Training
    • 4.1 Crafting
    • 4.2 Magic
  • 5 Changes
    • 5.1 Gallery (historical)

Obtaining[edit | edit source]

  • Obtained randomly while mining ores.
  • May be obtained from random event rewards.
  • One uncut ruby is rewarded from the Misthalin Mystery quest, along with two other uncut gems.
  • Two uncut rubies are rewarded from the Troll Romance quest, along with five other uncut gems.

Training[edit | edit source]

Crafting[edit | edit source]

Rubies can be crafted into jewellery at a furnace by using a gold bar and the appropriate crafting mould.

Level Input Material Cost[1] Output Sell Price Profit / loss XP/Craft XP/Hour Coins/XP
34 Uncut ruby 1,207 Ruby 884 −323 85 246,500 −3.8
34 Ruby Gold bar 971 Ruby ring 1,068 97 70 45,500 1.39
40 Ruby Gold bar 971 Ruby necklace 1,126 155 75 48,750 2.07
42 Ruby Gold bar 971 Ruby bracelet 1,180 209 80 52,000 2.61
50 Ruby Gold bar 971 Ruby amulet (u) 1,092 121 85 55,250 1.42
50 Ruby amulet (u) Ball of wool 1,127 Ruby amulet 1,124 −3 4 8,000 −0.75
  1. ↑ Cost calculated assuming all inputs are purchased from the Grand Exchange.

Magic[edit | edit source]

Ruby jewellery can be enchanted using Lvl-3 Enchant, requiring level 49 Magic. The spell requires 1 cosmic rune, 5 fire runes, and the piece of ruby jewellery that is to be enchanted.

Unenchanted Cost of Unenchanted Jewellery Material Cost[1] Enchanted Sell price Profit/Loss XP/Cast XP/Hour Coins/XP
Ruby ring 1,068 1,161 Ring of forging 1,004 −157 59 94,400 −2.66
Ruby necklace 1,126 1,219 Digsite pendant Not Sold −1,219 59 94,400 −20.66
Ruby bracelet 1,180 1,273 Inoculation bracelet 1,287 14 59 94,400 0.24
Ruby amulet 1,124 1,217 Amulet of strength 1,279 62 59 94,400 1.05
  1. ↑ Cost calculated using a staff of fire (provides unlimited fire runes) and includes costs of cosmic runes.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
24 July 2007
(update)

The item was graphically updated.

Date unknown

Gems available on free-to-play worlds can no longer be crushed with a hammer to receive a members object (crushed gem).
